name: asiatic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to Asia, especially when considering its geography or its plants and animals, rather than social or cultural matters: Anatolia is the Asiatic region of Turkey (= the part of Turkey that is in Asia rather than Europe). Compare
Asian adjective
